Description: Book of the Dead of Horemheb; frame 4(?); black line vignettes; Hieratic text in red and black ink.
Curator's comments: Published: Mosher, Catalogue of the Books of the Dead in the BM: The Papyrus of Hor, (2001), p.59 n.22. Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
